Content.Text:
Good morning. My apologies for calling on you
at this early hour, but I have some news that
might interest you.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today, we'll be having our annual <RED>Fall Concert</RED>,
and I was wondering if you'd like to join us.
<PAGE>
If you would like, please come to the <GREEN>Trade
Depot</GREEN> between <BLUE>10:00 and 13:00</BLUE>. We will wait
for you there.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If you would like to participate, you may do so
as a keyboardist. If you would rather not, you
may still come and watch.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I see. Well, if you have some free time later
today, you're more than welcome to come by
and watch.
<PAGE>
The concert will begin at 11:00.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You would like to participate? Oh, how
wonderful! Please come to the Trading Post by
11:00.
<PAGE>
We'll give you your instrument then. Don't worry,
there will be a rehearsal, so you'll have a chance
to practice.
<PAGE>
Well, I look forward to seeing you then.
